release.change: Corrected UI related items.
Added regional privacy filtering (You can enable/disable it in Settings->Privacy).
Fixed infinite redirects on some HTTPS resources.
Fixed scripts blocking problem on some websites.
Optimized page load time relating to HTTPS upgrades by using LevelDB.
Open custom tabs on supported applications only.
Fixed top crashes.
Optimized first time startup.
Fixed crash on startup on x86 devices with Android versions prior to 5.0.
Updated to Chromium v55.0.2883.84.
Fixed critical crashes in the internal library.
Updated app icons.
Fixed update check frequency.
Added Canvas and WebGL fingerprinting protection.
Fixed crashes on tracking protection module.
Updated to Chromium v54.0.2840.85.
Updated to Chromium v54.0.2840.68.
Fixed crash when we don’t have resource type information.
Fixed infinite redirects on some HTTPS resources.
Changed Bravery panel so it doesn’t close when tapping on a switch.
Added the Brave version in About Brave.
BUG FIX: Fixed a crash with Brave Shields switches.
